revised_title: Improving Pest Monitoring for Efficient Insecticide Use in Agriculture
tldr: The article discusses the importance of pest monitoring to aid in the efficient use of insecticides in agriculture. It highlights the need for better information to make decisions on whether pesticide treatments are necessary and when they should be applied for maximum effect. The author suggests improving current monitoring systems by developing more sophisticated insect detectors, methods of analysis, and communication procedures to create a pest monitoring system suitable for British agriculture.
